The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 January is 3,301,106 (5,864.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 24 January, there were 199,383 new confirmed cases (354.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 January, there were 267,170 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 25% (67,787 fewer cases).
